title: Mountain trip logger Smart2A
summary: The extension for use notification with SmartWatch2(SW2), Tasker event.
description: Mountain trip logger Smart2A is an application for use from SmartWatch2(SW2), SmartWatch(MN2) the "Mountain trip logger GOLD" GPS logger app. - The use is required Mountain trip logger GOLD version 4.1 - The free version of Mountain trip logger, not supported. - For Android Wear smartwatch, please use "Mountain trip logger Wear".■ What you can do - At SmartWatch, corresponds to the arrival alarm of Mountain trip logger GOLD. I ring the vibe and you can stop alarm at SmartWatch.■ Tasker event PluginWhen the alarm start, Tasker event will be triggered.Arrival alarm, deviate alarm, abnormal alarm.Other features, please use Mountain trip logger Smart2.LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatchSmart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
descriptionHTML:
Mountain trip logger Smart2A is an application for use from SmartWatch2(SW2), SmartWatch(MN2) the "Mountain trip logger GOLD" GPS logger app.
- The use is required Mountain trip logger GOLD version 4.1
- The free version of Mountain trip logger, not supported.
- For Android Wear smartwatch, please use "Mountain trip logger Wear".

■ What you can do
- At SmartWatch, corresponds to the arrival alarm of Mountain trip logger GOLD. I ring the vibe and you can stop alarm at SmartWatch.

■ Tasker event Plugin
When the alarm start, Tasker event will be triggered.
Arrival alarm, deviate alarm, abnormal alarm.

Other features, please use Mountain trip logger Smart2.

LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch
Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
recentChanges: -Support Tasker variable at event plugin function. (Arrival alarm: %dname, Altitude alarm: %alt).
-Support the altitude alarm at Tasker event Plugin. (Require Mountain trip logger GOLD v4.35+)
-Tasker event Plugin is supported. When the alarm start, Tasker event will be triggered.
